reviewText: highly recommend art Wolfe....love his work...always

Art Wolfe and team visit some of the mostly pristine cultural and natural environments in the world and captures them with breathtaking photography. I found myself even freeze framing portions of the video to study the images as they are composed of beautiful color and pattern that can't be fully appreciated in the speed at which they pass in the video. The sound tracts are great too.  A revelation of the profound beauty of our world for those who pause to look.
Art Wolfe is the finest nature photographer I've ever seen. The places he goes and the photos he takes are beyond compare, he is simply the best.

My parents don't get Travels to the Edge on their PBS station so I bought this DVD for them so they could watch some episodes. They loved it! Art Wolfe is great, and this particular DVD has wonderful episodes on it.
Art Wolfe's series is amazing for photographers and people who love to travel.  I love this set of CDs and just wish I could the Full Season one videos in a similar package.

Stunning photography and a great production. Art has a great screen presence and really seems to connect with the places he visits. Just finished watching all four in this series and enjoyed every one of them. Great work!!
